ctx: intros l1 l2 H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type l2 : list (A * B) a : A b : B l : list (A * B) H : forall b : B, ~ In (a, b) l H1 : unique_key l H2 : unique_key l2 H3 : forall (a0 : A) (b0 c : B), In (a0, b0) ((a, b) :: l) -> In (a0, c) l2 -> False IHunique_key : (forall (a : A) (b c : B), In (a, b) l -> In (a, c) l2 -> False) -> unique_key (l ++ l2) b0 : B Unable to unify "(fix In (a : A * B) (l : list (A * B)) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (a, ?M1438) l" with "(fix In (a : A * B) (l : list (A * B)) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (a, b0) ((fix app (l m : list (A * B)) {struct l} : list (A * B) := match l with | [] => m | a :: l1 => a :: app l1 m end) l l2)".

ctx: intros l1 l2 H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type l2 : list (A * B) a : A b : B l : list (A * B) H : forall b : B, In (a, b) l -> False H1 : unique_key l H2 : unique_key l2 H3 : forall (a0 : A) (b0 c : B), (a, b) = (a0, b0) \\/ In (a0, b0) l -> In (a0, c) l2 -> False IHunique_key : (forall (a : A) (b c : B), In (a, b) l -> In (a, c) l2 -> False) -> unique_key (l ++ l2) b0 : B H0 : In (a, b0) ((fix app (l m : list (A * B)) {struct l} : list (A * B) := match l with | [] => m | a :: l1 => a :: app l1 m end) l l2) Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M1767) (l : list ?M1767) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) ?M1770 (?M1768 ++ ?M1769)" with "False".

exceptions.exn: In environment H5 : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \\/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m) A : Type B : Type l2 : list (A * B) a : A b : B l : list (A * B) H : forall b : B, In (a, b) l -> False H1 : unique_key l H2 : unique_key l2 H3 : forall (a0 : A) (b0 c : B), (a, b) = (a0, b0) \\/ In (a0, b0) l -> In (a0, c) l2 -> False IHunique_key : (forall (a : A) (b c : B), In (a, b) l -> In (a, c) l2 -> False) -> unique_key (l ++ l2) b0 : B H0 : In (a, b0) ((fix app (l m : list (A * B)) {struct l} : list (A * B) := match l with | [] => m | a :: l1 => a :: app l1 m end) l l2) Unable to unify "In (a, b0) ((fix app (l m : list (A * B)) {struct l} : list (A * B) := match l with | [] => m | a :: l1 => a :: app l1 m end) l l2)" with "False".
